welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.instructions: This form will guide you through the necessary steps to complete your application.

card_selection.title: Select Your Card
card_selection.subtitle: Choose the product that best suits you.

personal_info.title: Your Personal Information
personal_info.subtitle: Please fill in the fields below.
personal_info.pin_desc: Choose a 4-digit PIN. It will be used to verify your identity when communicating with support.

credit_check.title: Identity Verification
credit_check.subtitle: For your security, we need to verify your identity using your credit file.
credit_check.sin_desc: Your SIN is used only for this verification and is not stored.
credit_check.questions_subtitle: Please answer the following questions based on your credit history.
credit_check.no_report_desc: We could not find a matching credit file or the data was insufficient. You may continue your application.
credit_check.failed_desc: The answers provided do not match our records. For security reasons, you cannot continue this application online.

financial_info.title: Financial Information
financial_info.subtitle: This information helps us determine your eligibility.
financial_info.has_t4: I can provide my latest T4 slip (federal).
financial_info.t4_income: Total income from box 14 of your T4

review.title: Review Your Application
review.subtitle: Please ensure all information is accurate before submitting.
review.name: Name
review.consent_pi_desc: I consent to the processing of my personal information as described in the privacy policy.
review.consent_financial_desc: I authorize the disclosure of my financial information stored on Inglis Dominion for the purpose of this application.
review.consent_biometric_desc: I accept the processing of my behavioral data (typing habits, mouse movements, etc.) for fraud prevention.
review.success_message: Your application has been submitted successfully!
review.processing_desc: Our system is analyzing your application. Please wait a moment.
review.approved_desc: Your new card has been issued and an activation email has been sent to you.
review.rejected_desc: Unfortunately, we cannot approve your application at this time.

confirmation.title: Application Submitted!
confirmation.description: Thank you. Your application has been sent to {{institutionName}} for review. You will receive a communication from them shortly.
